about.summary: The 'ggplot2' package provides simple functions for visualizing contours of 2-d kernel density estimates. 'ggdensity' implements several additional density estimators as well as more interpretable visualizations based on highest density regions instead of the traditional height of the estimated density surface.

The 'ggplot2' package provides simple functions for visualizing contours of 2-d kernel density estimates. 'ggdensity' implements several additional density estimators as well as more interpretable visualizations based on highest density regions instead of the traditional height of the estimated density surface.

name: r-ggdensity
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.0.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggdensity
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggdensity_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggdensity/ggdensity_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7535f01da56db7904a42e7e5d2f76d25d3f9034987269d142b20b7cc3a5b7e4b

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-isoband
    - r-scales
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-isoband
    - r-scales

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggdensity')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggdensity')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://jamesotto852.github.io/ggdensity/
  license: MIT
  summary: The 'ggplot2' package provides simple functions for visualizing contours of 2-d kernel
    density estimates. 'ggdensity' implements several additional density estimators
    as well as more interpretable visualizations based on highest density regions instead
    of the traditional height of the estimated density surface.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
